<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.FlowActionConnectionAlias</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>FlowActionConnectionAlias</name> <script><![CDATA[var FlowActionConnectionAlias = Class.create(); FlowActionConnectionAlias.prototype = { type: 'FlowActionConnectionAlias',
getChildQualifier: function(dataStreamActionId) { var connectionAlias = new sn_impex.FlowActionConnectionUtility().forFlowAction(dataStreamActionId); if (connectionAlias) return "sys_id=" + connectionAlias + "^ORparent=" + connectionAlias; return "parent=NO_MATCH"; } };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-01-19 23:34:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>557e251bb701011025319481de11a9c6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>FlowActionConnectionAlias</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System Import Data Source" source="com.glide.system_import_data_source">205d38876d2220100acb70b353433035</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_557e251bb701011025319481de11a9c6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-05 01:26:56</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>410</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
